summary: This mod add Anders as a companion
descriptionHtml:
============
DESCRIPTION
============
This mod add Anders from DA2 as a companion
Stats : Calculated 67 level , Frost Cloak , Frost Magic
Inventory: Mage Clothes , Fireball Staff
You can find him in Winterhold (Frozen Hearth)

=============
RECOMMENDED
=============
Faces by Geonox
Beards

============
REQUIRED
============
Apachii Sky Hair Male 1.0 STANDALONE


===========
INSTALL
===========
Put into Data folder

===========
UNINSTALL
===========
Delete bsa and esp files
author: Den987
